comment.text: This translation key is used for a placeholder text in an input field that asks users to enter their instance ID. It appears in a login wizard page and will be displayed when the instance ID field is empty or not yet populated. The purpose of this text is to guide users by providing a clear instruction on what value they should enter.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "أدخل معرف المثيل الخاص بك" while generally understandable, is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would be "أدخل رقم تعريف المثيل" or simply "أدخل رقم المثيل". The phrase "الخاص بك" (al-khaas bik - yours) is unnecessary and sounds slightly awkward in this context.
The translation 'Въведете вашия ID на екземпляра' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to phrase this in Bulgarian. It sounds slightly awkward. 'ID на екземпляра' is a bit formal.

The translation 'Kirjoita esiintymätunnuksesi' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Type your instance ID'. 'Esiintymätunnus' is a somewhat technical term. A more natural and common translation would be 'Syötä instanssitunnuksesi' or 'Anna instanssitunnuksesi'.

The translation 'Մուտքագրեք ձեր օրինակի ID-ն' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Նույցեք ձեր օրինակի ID-ն' or 'Մուտքագրեք օրինակի ID-ն'.
The translation 'Inserisci l’istanza del tuo ID' is not an accurate translation of 'Type your instance ID'. The phrase 'istanza del tuo ID' is awkward and doesn't convey the intended meaning.
While not strictly incorrect, 'Inserisci il tuo ID istanza' is more natural and idiomatic than a more literal translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed beyond the incorrect translation correction.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Ierakstiet savu instances ID' is a very literal translation. A more natural and idiomatic Latvian phrasing would be 'Norādiet savu instances ID' or 'Lūdzu, norādiet savu instances ID'.

The translation "Typ uw instance ID" is a direct transliteration of the English phrase rather than a natural Dutch translation. While understandable, it's not idiomatic. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Voer uw instance ID in" or "Vul uw instance ID in".

The translation 'Напечатайте ID вашего экземпляра' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Type your instance ID'. 'Напечатайте' implies printing, while 'Type' means to enter text. A more appropriate verb would be 'Введите'.

The term 'උදාහරණ' (udaharana) can sometimes be ambiguous. While technically correct, 'උදාහරණය' (udaharanya) might be slightly more precise in this context, referring to a specific example or instance.

The translation "Zadajte svoje instance ID" is not entirely accurate. While "Zadajte" means 'Enter/Type', 'svoje' (your) is grammatically incorrect in this context. The instance ID is not the user's own.
The term 'instance ID' is a compound noun and ideally should be kept as a single unit within the translation (no space between 'ID' and 'instance').

The translation 'Napiši svoj ID instance' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Type your instance ID'. While understandable, 'Napiši' (write) is less suitable than a verb implying input or providing. 'ID instance' is also slightly awkward; 'ID naprave' would be more idiomatic for 'instance ID'.

The translation "Унесите свој ID инстанце" is technically correct, but less natural than alternatives. The possessive "свој" (your/one's) might be unnecessary and slightly awkward in this context, which is typically instructional, not personal.
While technically correct, "Unesite svoj ID instance" is not the most natural or idiomatic translation. "Svoj" implies possession, which isn't necessary here. It sounds slightly awkward.

The translation 'Nhập mã phiên bản của bạn' is not the most accurate translation of 'Type your instance ID'. 'Mã phiên bản' literally translates to 'version code', which isn't quite the same as an instance ID. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of an identifier or a unique code.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập ID phiên bản của bạn
